ValidationRule.description: SF-64 This validation rule should ensure, that all Sales Tax Id Numbers are in the correct format according to their respective country. Format ("[FR]{2}\\d{9}"). Example: FR999999999
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Core_Sales_Tax_ID_No__c )), BillingCountry == "FR" ), NOT(REGEX( Core_Sales_Tax_ID_No__c , ("[FR]{2}[A-Z0-9]{2}\\d{9}"))), False) && ISPICKVAL( Core_Customer_Type__c, "7") && $Permission.Core_Account_Bypass_Validation_Rules = FALSE
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter a valid Sales Tax format! This should start with the two letter country code, followed by two capital letters or two number and an additional nine numbers. Example: FRXX999999999
